message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You can have less, I'm the stronger negotiator!
You're trying to bully me, but I'm not afraid! I'll give you a slightly better deal this time.
You're not as tough as you think, Alice. Take it or leave it!
You're getting desperate, Bob. I'll give you a slightly better deal, but don't think you're getting off that easy!
You're running out of time, Alice. Don't make me have to take it all!
You're getting desperate, Bob. I'll give you a slightly better deal, but I'm not going to let you take advantage of me!
You're getting close to losing everything, Alice. Don't push me too far!
You're getting closer to desperation, Bob. I'll give you a slightly better deal, but I'm not going to let you take everything!
You're almost out of time, Alice. This is my final offer. Take it or leave it!
You're getting desperate, Bob. I'll give you a slightly better deal, but I'm not going to let you take everything. This is my final offer!
It's all or nothing now, Alice. I'm taking the rest. Goodbye!
